item.description: Just as an aside, Alexei Sayle has some really interesting things to say on alternative comedy, post-punk and politics <a href="http://www.chortle.co.uk/news/2014/02/19/19635/how_the_bland_and_the_posh_failed_alternative_comedy" rel="nofollow">here</a>
